title: Public sector workers set for pay rise - Sunak
content: The chancellor will use his Budget on Wednesday to confirm that the "pay pause" is being lifted.

title: Public sector workers set for pay rise - Sunak
content: The chancellor will use his Budget on Wednesday to confirm that the "pay pause" is being lifted.

title: 'The more we wait, the more in danger we are'
content: Afghans are pressing the UK government to announce when its new resettlement scheme will open.

title: No VAT cut to household energy bills in Budget
content: Treasury sources say such a move would be badly targeted and there are other ways to help those struggling.

title: Watchdog recommends 30-day suspension for Tory MP
content: A report says ex-minister Owen Paterson had used his position as MP to benefit two companies who paid him.

title: Budget 2021: What has already been announced?
content: Rishi Sunak's statement isn't until Wednesday, but several pledges have been announced.

title: Tory MPs defend votes after uproar over sewage plan
content: Conservative MPs are facing a backlash on social media after rejecting tougher sewage protections in the Environment Bill.

title: Make people fly less, ministers told
content: The government must cut demand for flying and meat under plans to curb climate change, experts say.
